Kata Pengamat Soal Rekam Jejak Dirjen Pajak Suryo Utomo
01 Nov 2019, 08:52 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Antara Foto

Jakarta - Dipilihnya Suryo Utomo sebagai Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak Kementerian Keuangan (Kemenkeu) merupakan pilihan yang tepat. Sebab, hal ini menunjukkan kepercayaan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pada internal Direktorat Jenderal Pajak (DJP).Demikian disampaikan Direktur Eksekutif Center for Indonesia Taxation Analysis (CITA) Yustinus Prastowo dalam keterangan tertulis yang diterima detikcom, Jumat (1/11/2019)."Pilihan terhadap Suryo Utomo kami nilai tepat karena dua alasan. Pertama, menunjukkan kepercayaan Presiden dan Menteri Keuangan kepada internal Ditjen Pajak," katanya.Kemudian, pemilihan Suryo Utomo dianggap tepat karena menimbang rekam jejaknya. Serta, perannya terhadap pajak dalam 4 tahun terakhir."Rekam jejak pribadi Suryo Utomo sebagai pejabat yang lahir dan dibesarkan di Dirjen Pajak menjadi modal kuat untuk memimpin DJP. Terlebih 4 tahun terakhir sebagai Staf Ahli Menkeu terlibat sangat aktif dan dekat dalam proses penyusunan UU Pengampunan Pajak, UU Akses Informasi Keuangan untuk Kepentingan Perpajakan, Tim Reformasi Perpajakan, dan review atas seluruh rancangan peraturan perpajakan," paparnya."Sepanjang 4 tahun ini interaksi, komunikasi, dan jejaring dengan seluruh pemangku kepentingan akan sangat mendukung tugas sebagai Dirjen Pajak," imbuhnya.Namun, tugas berat dan setumpuk pekerjaan rumah menanti Suryo Utomo. Dia menyebut tekanan perekonomian global dan domestik akan berdampak pada penerimaan pajak."Untuk itu dibutuhkan kepemimpinan yang lebih proaktif, didukung teamwork yang solid, lincah, dan profesional, dan dukungan politik yang kuat, khususnya menuntaskan revisi UU Perpajakan, perbaikan kelembagaan, core tax system, dan pemanfaatan data/informasi perpajakan. Dalam waktu dekat kami juga mendukung dan mendorong konsolidasi internal segera dilakukan agar dapat segera bekerja cepat," jelasnya.Saat dikonfirmasi, Yustinus mengatakan, rekam jejak Suryo Utomo cukup bagus dan lengkap."Menurut saya cukup bagus. Rekam jejaknya juga panjang dan lengkap," katanya.Simak Video "Gaya Cool Dirjen Pajak Saat Mengisi Kuliah Umum di UI"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)

Said Observer of the Director General of Taxation Suryo Utomo's Footprint
01 Nov 2019, 08:52 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Between Photos

Jakarta - The election of Suryo Utomo as Director General (Dirjen) of the Ministry of Finance Tax (Ministry of Finance) is the right choice. Because, this shows the confidence of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) in the internal of the Directorate General of Taxes (DJP). Thus said the Executive Director of the Center for Indonesia Taxation Analysis (CITA) Yustinus Prastowo in a written statement received by AFP on Friday (11/01/2019) "We consider the choice of Suryo Utomo right for two reasons. First, it shows the confidence of the President and the Minister of Finance internally within the Directorate General of Taxes," he said. As well as, its role in taxation in the last 4 years. "Suryo Utomo's personal track record as an official born and raised in the Director General of Taxes has become a strong capital to lead the DGT. Especially the last 4 years as the Expert Staff of the Minister of Finance is very active and close involved in the process of preparing the Amnesty Law Taxes, the Law on Access to Financial Information for Taxation Purposes, the Tax Reform Team, and a review of all draft tax regulations, "he explained." Throughout the past 4 years interaction, communication and networking with all stakeholders will strongly support his duties as Director General of Taxes, "he added. However, a heavy task and a pile of homework awaits Suryo Utomo. He said global and domestic economic pressures would have an impact on tax revenues. "For that we need more proactive leadership, supported by solid, agile, and professional teamwork, and strong political support, specifically completing the revision of the Taxation Law, institutional improvement, the core tax system , and the utilization of tax data / information. In the near future we will also support and encourage internal consolidation to be carried out immediately so that it can work quickly, "he explained. When confirmed, Yustinus said, Suryo Utomo's track record was quite good and complete." In my opinion it is quite good. The track record is also long and complete, "he said.
